posts.text: Welcome to my(Geo Zhou’s) Blog! This is my first post to just introduce myself. Hobbies Playing computer games Watching soccer games Doing fitness Trying to learn skating and other sports! Make FriendsYou can connect with me via many social media like Ins, X, Linkin, Wechat and ect.. With high school With BJUT friends With Assistant Technical Managers When Graduate from BJUT 1 When Graduate from BJUT 2 With Dr. Ma When Graduate from BJUT 3 When Mayday With Undergraduate Roommates With Xiangbo With Ethan, Lu With Cheng With Lu, Shuchen With Boss With Dr. Xu With Terry In JJ Lin Live ‹ › /* Scoped 样式，避免影响主题 */ .x-carousel{width:100%;max-width:900px;margin:1rem auto;position:relative; aspect-ratio:var(--ratio,16/9);border-radius:12px;overflow:hidden;background:#000;} .x-carousel__viewport{height:100%;position:relative} .x-carousel__slide{position:absolute;inset:0;opacity:0;transition:opacity .5s ease} .x-carousel__slide.is-active{opacity:1} .x-carousel img{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;display:block} .x-carousel__caption{position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;padding:.5rem .75rem; font-size:.9rem;color:#fff;background:linear-gradient(transparent,rgba(0,0,0,.55))} .x-carousel__ctrl{position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translateY(-50%); background:rgba(0,0,0,.4);border:none;color:#fff;font-size:1.8rem;line-height:1; width:42px;height:42px;border-radius:50%;cursor:pointer;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center} .x-carousel__ctrl:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,.6)} .x-carousel__prev{left:.5rem} .x-carousel__next{right:.5rem} .x-carousel__dots{position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:.5rem;display:flex;gap:.4rem;justify-content:center} .x-carousel__dots button{width:8px;height:8px;border-radius:50%;border:none;cursor:pointer;background:rgba(255,255,255,.5)} .x-carousel__dots button.is-active{background:#fff} @media (max-width:640px){ .x-carousel__ctrl{font-size:1.4rem;width:36px;height:36px} .x-carousel__caption{font-size:.8rem} } (function(){ const carousels = document.querySelectorAll('.x-carousel'); carousels.forEach(root => { const viewport = root.querySelector('.x-carousel__viewport'); const slides = Array.from(root.querySelectorAll('.x-carousel__slide')); const btnPrev = root.querySelector('.x-carousel__prev'); const btnNext = root.querySelector('.x-carousel__next'); const dotsWrap = root.querySelector('.x-carousel__dots'); // 自适应比例（可通过 data-ratio 覆盖，例：data-ratio="4/3" 或 "1/1"） const ratio = root.getAttribute('data-ratio') || '16/9'; root.style.setProperty('--ratio', ratio); // 生成圆点 const dots = slides.map((_, i) => { const b = document.createElement('button'); b.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Go to slide ' + (i+1)); b.addEventListener('click', () => go(i, true)); dotsWrap.appendChild(b); return b; }); let index = slides.findIndex(s => s.classList.contains('is-active')); if (index < 0) index = 0, slides[0].classList.add('is-active'); function render(){ slides.forEach((s,i)=>s.classList.toggle('is-active', i===index)); dots.forEach((d,i)=>d.classList.toggle('is-active', i===index)); } function go(i, manual){ index = (i + slides.length) % slides.length; render(); if (manual) restart(); } function next(){ go(index+1); } function prev(){ go(index-1); } btnNext.addEventListener('click', next); btnPrev.addEventListener('click', prev); // 自动播放（可用 data-interval 改间隔，单位 ms；设为 0 关闭） const interval = parseInt(root.getAttribute('data-interval') || '3000', 10); let timer = null; function start(){ if (!interval) return; stop(); timer = setInterval(next, interval); } function stop(){ if (timer) clearInterval(timer); timer = null; } function restart(){ stop(); start(); } // 悬停暂停 root.addEventListener('mouseenter', stop); root.addEventListener('mouseleave', start); // 键盘可访问性 root.addEventListener('keydown', (e)=>{ if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') prev(); if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') next(); }); root.tabIndex = 0; render(); start(); }); })();
